name: Dating Dungeon
description:
This was a project I created with a team for a class assignment last year. I got permission from my teammates to upload this. Uploaded now for the sake of adding to my portfolio. A bit rough around the edges since the semester was brought online midway due to the pandemic. Regardless, I hope you enjoy it!

Play as Fetch to woo one of three lovers: the bloodthirsty Calem, the fish obsessed Marina, and the photographer Cameron.
